subject: Horse Racing
Doping (Sports)
Animal Abuse, Rights and Welfare
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
organizations: People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals
lead_paragraph: Besides fining Asmussen $10,000, the New York State Gaming Commission on Monday proposed new regulations on the care of horses and the use of drugs in the sport.
snippet: Besides fining Asmussen $10,000, the New York State Gaming Commission on Monday proposed new regulations on the care of horses and the use of drugs in the sport.
